name: IRFPAI_COGNITIVE_INFO
description: This table stores the values documented in the IRF-PAI for Section C (Care Tool) cognition items.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the abstraction for this row.

columns.name: EXPRESSION_OF_IDEAS_WANTS_C
columns.description: This element measures expression of ideas and wants while considering both verbal and non-verbal expression and excluding language barriers.

columns.name: UNDERSTAND_VERBAL_AND_NONVRB_C
columns.description: This element measures understanding of verbal and nonverbal content, with a hearing aid or device if used, and excluding language barriers.

columns.name: COMMUNICATION_SCORE
columns.description: The total score for a patient's ability to express ideas and verbal and nonverbal communication.

columns.name: BIMS_STATUS_C
columns.description: Indicates if the staff believes the patient is capable of participating in a brief interview to evaluate the patient's mental status.

columns.name: REPETITION_OF_THREE_WORDS_NUM
columns.description: Indicates the number of words the resident could recall properly after the first attempt.

columns.name: TEMPORAL_ORIENTATION_YEAR_C
columns.description: Indicates that the patient is able to report the correct year or how inaccurate the patient's guess was.

columns.name: TEMPORAL_ORIENTATION_MONTH_C
columns.description: Indicates that the patient is able to report the correct month or how inaccurate the patient's guess was.

columns.name: TEMPORAL_ORIENTATION_DAY_C
columns.description: Indicates that the patient is able to report the correct day of the week or how inaccurate the patient's guess was.

columns.name: RECALL_SOCK_C
columns.description: Indicates the patient's ability to recall "sock" with or without cueing

columns.name: RECALL_BLUE_C
columns.description: Indicates the patient's ability to recall "blue" with or without cueing

columns.name: RECALL_BED_C
columns.description: Indicates the patient's ability to recall "bed" with or without cueing

columns.name: BIMS_SUMMARY_SCORE
columns.description: The total Brief Interview for Mental Status (BIMS) assessment score for a patient at a particular assessment (99 indicates a question could not be completed during the interview).

columns.name: UNABLE_TO_COMPLETE_BIMS_YN
columns.description: This element indicates if the Brief Interview for Mental Status (BIMS) interview was not able to be completed.

columns.name: STAFF_ASMT_FOR_MENTAL_STAT_C
columns.description: Indicates whether the staff should attempt an assessment of the patient's mental status due to an incomplete interview.

columns.name: MEMORYRECALL_CURRENT_SEASON_YN
columns.description: Indicates the patient's ability to recall current season.

columns.name: MEMORYRECALL_ROOM_LOCATION_YN
columns.description: Indicates the patient's ability to recall room location.

columns.name: MEMORYRECALL_STAFF_NAMES_YN
columns.description: Indicates the patient's ability to recall staff names.

columns.name: MEMORYRECALL_IN_HOSPUNIT_YN
columns.description: Indicates the patient's ability to recall hospital or unit name.

columns.name: MEMORY_SCORE
columns.description: The total memory score for the patient based on the patient's Brief Interview for Mental Status (BIMS) assessment.
